name: Can Violence Cure my Little Sister’s Nightmares? Showdown at the Haunted Mansion
name_original: Can Violence Cure my Little Sister’s Nightmares? Showdown at the Haunted Mansion
description:
When Lucy's little sister, Vivi, is cursed with nightmares from a mysterious source, it's up to Lucy to resolve the situation. Will violence be the answer to all things like television has so thoroughly taught her, or do these wayward spirits have more secrets than fists alone can solve?

A short visual novel made for Spooktober 2022. We decided to shake off the cobwebs and poke around Ren'Py 8 to see what's new. Enjoy our silly adventure.

PUNCH GHOST!

Story: @AmbiReine
Posing: @HalcySorceress
Ren'Py: @KeytarPrincess
Music: Ouvi
QA: @AlmightyKurama
